LOGIN_SUB_OWNER: Welcome to Book Voyage! After you login, we will take you to your book journeys.
FORM_MAP_WELCOME: Look at you! Congratulations on being the {{ currentHolder }} holder of this book.
FORM_MAP_WELCOME_2: Will you get it closer to its final destination?
FORM_MAP_WELCOME_2_OWNERLESS: This one has no destination. Will you get it to an exciting location?
PLEASE_LOCATE: Please locate where you're reading it.
ALLOW_LOCATION_REQUEST: Please allow the location request by your browser
FORM_MAP_P2_H: Aha! So that’s where it has gotten itself. Not bad!
FORM_MAP_P2_SH: Does the shown location look about correct?
FORM_MAP_P3_SH: You can be anonymous, but the community cannot find you that way.
OPT_DATA: I agree with the use of my provided data*
OPT_RECEIVE_UPDATES: I want to receive book updates by e-mail
OPT_ANONYMOUS: I want my name censored on the site
FORM_MAP_P4_H: Time to leave your mark with a message!
FORM_MAP_P4_SH: Tell the community a bit about yourself.
WRITE_MESSAGE: Write your public message here (enters will be removed)
FORM_MAP_P5_H: You have now officially been added to this book’s tale. We are curious to see how you will continue it!
FORM_MAP_P5_SH: You will receive an e-mail with a tracking link soon.
FILL_IN_CITY: Fill in the city you took the book to:
ADDRESS_FAIL: Geolocation failed - did you type that correctly?
GPS_FAIL: Geolocation failed - please try again or locate by city.
RESET_PASSWORD_DESC: Oops! Enter your e-mail address here and we will send you a reset link. Make sure to double-check for typos.
INVALID_EMAIL: Ensure you enter a valid e-mail address
PASSWORD_LINK_DESC: Or follow this link to change your password
JOURNEY_STARTED_SUB: Let's first set you up with a password.
ERROR_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Sorry! Your previous token expired. Please request a new link here and try again.
ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, an error occurred! Please contact ahoi@edushifts.world.
ERROR_PASSWORD_LENGTH: The password needs to be at least 8 characters long
ERROR_WRONG_CODE: The code you entered was incorrect. Please double-check it.
ERROR_SESSION_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please login again.
ERROR_JOURNEY_NOT_BEGUN: The journey you looked up has not yet begun.
CHECK_INBOX_RESET: Please check your inbox for your reset link.
EMAIL_CHANGED: Your email address has been changed. You can now log in again.
OWNER_BOOK_TEMP: As an owner, you will soon be able to add a message and change your location. Contact us if you need this earlier.
NO_BOOKS_FOUND_DESC: Did you finish the book registration?
